channel.description:
Hello everybody, A new server called PeeKay by Panu and Crooks, The creators of demon-classic.
This server is very similar to the old Stork PK with points that let you distribute amongst skills and change your combat level how you desire.
* <- client download ,and registration.
[b] Christmas PeeKay ALSO Features:[/b] Point Panel Points Points To cash God spells Client Zoom Kills & Deaths + K/D Ratio Stakes Won & Lost. [b]50X Experience rate, 75X in wild![/b] Many places to train, most places based from stork. AFK Room . Users online/Users in wilderness in client. Free/Members PKing switch. Free Sharks Potions from apothecary Christmas Dungeon(Evil Santa), requires 30 points to get into the lair, also not always open we don't want other wilderness areas to die. Snowy layout. Throwable Snowballs, hits only in wilderness, throw-able outside wilderness too (For Events and fun!)
* <- client download ,and registration.
Admins ~Panu ~Crooks * <- client download ,and registration.
There are moderator spots open, but don't think you can ask for mod when you first log in, first mods are going to be chosen after first week!
Pictures:
[img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/5097/poolpn.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/9393/presento.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/3240/santaj.jpg[/img]
[size=16pt][url=http://www.peekay.info]http://www.peekay.info[/url][/size]<- client download ,and registration.
[img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/3268/shopg.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/8555/statusm.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/483/treedq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/1679/dfgx.png[/img]
Hope you'll enjoy! * <- client download ,and registration.

item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:3, topic:325069”][quote author=Anc13nts253 link=topic=421414.msg3094921#msg3094921 date=1263184633]
Reported, advertising forums outside of the signature.
[/quote]

Look again then idiot, hes not adv a forum. people seriuos are stupid these day.[/quote]

Actually, idiot, he has the link to the site in his advertisement post, not his signature. It’s against the rules to do this, you illiterate fuck.

There is also 2 advertisements for the same server. Also against the rules.

item.description:
@reimon wrote:

Hello everybody, A new server called PeeKay by Panu and Crooks, The creators of demon-classic.

This server is very similar to the old Stork PK with points that let you distribute amongst skills and change your combat level how you desire.

  • <- client download ,and registration.


Christmas PeeKay ALSO Features:
Point Panel

Stakes Won & Lost.

Many places to train, most places based from stork.
AFK Room .
Users online/Users in wilderness in client.

Free Sharks
Potions from apothecary
Christmas Dungeon(Evil Santa), requires 30 points to get into the lair, also not always open we don’t want other wilderness areas to die.
Snowy layout.
Throwable Snowballs, hits only in wilderness, throw-able outside wilderness too (For Events and fun!)
